title: So riot's buffing domination by giving the hunter runes gold on kill
body:
Meddler: but we totally want to curb snowballing

Say one thing, do another, repeat forever.

replies.body: That's just a tooltip error.  It doesn't actually give bonus gold.

Yep. This is a change we discarded a month or two back. Tooltips for it got accidentally bundled in with the Ghost Poro and Zombie Ward changes though, so will be on PBE for a day.
